word_mean: 腐胺：化学式为NH2(CH2)4NH2，一种多胺，最初发现于腐败的动物组织，现知可发生于几乎各种组织及某些细菌培养物中，是由鸟尿酸脱羧形成，乃亚精胺的前体

sentence.Network_en: Spermine ( Spm ) and putrescine ( Put ) content were significantly higher than cadavarine ( Cad ) and spermidine ( Spd ) during rhizome development.
sentence.Network_cn: 精胺 ( Spm ) 和腐胺 ( Put ) 在膨大过程中含量高,尸胺 ( Cad ) 和亚精胺 ( Spd ) 含量较低.

sentence.Network_en: Putrescine ( PUT ), spermidine ( SPD ) and spermine ( SPM ) were present in cucumber seeds.
sentence.Network_cn: 黄瓜种子中存在着腐胺 、 亚精胺和精胺三种内源 多胺.
